channel.title: [Code?]NPC that gives exp amount, only if special item in inventory. [PI]
channel.description:
How can I make NPC that gives some exp amount, only if i have a special item in invenotry?
for example: I click a npc.
If i am wielding a "net", and have a "jar" in inventory. And my skill level is "20". it gives me "500" exp in that skill. And replaces the "jar" with the "filled jar". (and disapears for a few seconds. Or dies, cause it will respawn later anyway.)
If i am not wearing a "net". Or dont have "jar". Sends message: you don't have the right tools for this.
If i don't have atleast level "20". Sends message: you need a level 20 to do this.
Just a code like this? Can't fugre it out how to do all of this. Just know only different parts.
P.S. Maybe not the full code, only some parts are appriciated too...

item.title: [Code?]NPC that gives exp amount, only if special item in inventory. [PI]
item.dc:creator: @x1_att_ftw_x x1 att ftw x
item.description:
@x1_att_ftw_x wrote:

if(NPCID == 49 && playerHasItem((####,1)) { addItem(####, 1); deleteItem(####,1); addSkillXP(500, 13); }

= item id

Read full topic
item.source: [Code?]NPC that gives exp amount, only if special item in inventory. [PI]

@Svitkona wrote:

Are you trying to make it so if you attack, it gives you 500 xp?

@Eyfia wrote:

How can I make NPC that gives some exp amount, only if i have a special item in invenotry?

for example:
I click a npc.

If i am wielding a “net”, and have a “jar” in inventory. And my skill level is “20”.
it gives me “500” exp in that skill. And replaces the “jar” with the “filled jar”. (and disapears for a few seconds. Or dies, cause it will respawn later anyway.)

If i am not wearing a “net”. Or dont have “jar”.
Sends message: you don’t have the right tools for this.

If i don’t have atleast level “20”.
Sends message: you need a level 20 to do this.

Just a code like this? Can’t fugre it out how to do all of this. Just know only different parts.
